data.actual_result: It changes the game activity back to discord.
data.expected_result: It should never switch the game activity while using safari and wanting to go back on discord
data.short_description: As I switch tabs from discord to safari the game activity keeps changing frequently when I go back on discord .
data.steps_to_repro: - go to game activity - add your game for example safari - then switch the app to safari while you see discord game activity - then go back to discord and it suddenly changes the game activity to Discord
